faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Here are the most frequently asked questions.

qna.program_q1: Where should I start when using it for the first time?
qna.program_a1: Please refer to the 'Getting Started' guide in the manual. You need to link your API key first.
qna.program_q2: The design looks strange or images are not displayed.
qna.program_a2: Please check your internet connection and try restarting the program.
qna.program_q3: An error occurred in the log window while running.
qna.program_a3: Please capture the error code and contact support.
qna.program_q4: My account balance shows 0 after running the program.
qna.program_a4: It may take some time to synchronize with the exchange. Please click the refresh button.
qna.account_q1: I want to create a GlobX-exclusive account, but I already have one.
qna.account_a1: You can create a sub-account or use your existing one if API permissions are set correctly.
qna.account_a2: Please ensure your ID photos are clear and try again in a well-lit environment.
qna.trading_q1: I entered 1 or 2 positions, but the 3rd order is not executing.
qna.trading_a1: This might be due to margin limits or strategy settings. Please check your max position settings.
qna.trading_q2: Is it okay to stop and restart the program while holding positions?
qna.trading_a2: Yes, the program will recognize existing positions upon restart.
qna.trading_q3: The program doesn't start because entry count is below 6-7.
qna.trading_a3: The strategy requires a minimum historical data set to calculate indicators.
qna.trading_q4: Will new positions be entered if I turn it off and on with existing positions?
qna.trading_a4: It depends on your 'Allow New Entry' setting in the config.
qna.funds_q1: What is the minimum USDT required to run the program?
qna.funds_a1: We recommend a minimum of 500 USDT for stable operation.
qna.funds_a2: It depends on the market volatility and your leverage settings.
qna.funds_a3: This refers to the calculation deviation in retracement levels.
qna.data_q1: When does the data sharing count reset?
qna.data_a1: It resets every day at 00:00 UTC.
